PSCT.Base: You can only control 1 "Ranryu". If you control a Spellcaster monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster with 1500 ATK/200 DEF in your GY, except "Ranryu"; Special Summon it.
